newsitem.title: USA: Municipal sales total $278 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Municipal sales total $278 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales for Thursday are expected to total $278 million in 17 offerings, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $260 million in 14 sales. The largest is a $124.6 million Washington Suburban Santitary District, Md., deal at 1100 EST.
Negotiated sales total $18 million in three offerings. The largest is a $9 million Millersburg Area School District, Pa., deal through Wheat First Butcher Singer.

An additional $25 million deal from the Tennessee Education Funding agency is on the possible list, meaning senior manager William R Hough said it may price the deal Thursday depending on market conditions.
